headline: GRANVILLE PHILLIPS GAUGE CONTROLLER
description: Series 340 Gauge Controller    Capable of powering and reading from four capacitance gauges.
specstable:
Manufacturer Granville Phil
Model 341581
Description Series 340 Gauge Controller
Cables Included No
Other Information

Custom configuration originally for MRC but not MRC specific
Four capacitance manometer modules
Each module can power and read from standard capacitance manometer transducers
No front panel displays or controls
RS-232 interface module

Power Requirements 115 V
Exterior Dimensions
Width 9.500 in (24.1 cm)
Depth 14.000 in (35.6 cm)
Height 3.500 in (8.9 cm)
